name: Speedrun Puzzle
description:
I feel like I could've added more, but I really only had less than 5 hours to work on it and I started too ambitiously. I hope you enjoy it somewhat.
I tried adding a leaderboard, but that didn't go well for my sanity.

Play with the W,A,S,D or arrow keys! Beat my 40.67s score :)

Added more songs cuz they are a vibe. 
Also, all of the code and the models are by me, basically everything else but the music. Music is distributed/made by Pix on Youtube.
